## **🛠️ Potential Fix - Simplify Desktop Header Logic:**

```typescript:src/features/purchaseModal/components/PurchaseModal.tsx
// Replace the desktop header section (around line 530) with this:
{/* Header - Use PaymentHeader during payment, regular header otherwise */}
{isPaymentState ? (
  <PaymentHeader
    contentTitle={content?.title || 'Content'}
    contentPrice={content?.price || 0}
    onBack={handleBackFromPayment}
    onClose={onClose}
  />
) : (
  <Box
    sx={{
      display: 'flex',
      justifyContent: 'space-between',
      alignItems: 'center',
      p: 4,
      borderBottom: `1px solid ${uiBorderColor || 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)'}`,
      backdropFilter: 'blur(24px)',
      WebkitBackdropFilter: 'blur(24px)',
      background: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)',
    }}
  >
    <PlatformBranding textColor={textColor} />
    
    <IconButton
      onClick={onClose}
      sx={{
        color: textColor || 'white',
        backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15)',
        border: `1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)`,
        borderRadius: '12px',
        width: 48,
        height: 48,
        '&:hover': {
          backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)',
          transform: 'scale(1.05)',
        },
        transition: 'all 0.2s ease-in-out',
      }}
    >
      <CloseIcon sx={{ fontSize: 24 }} />
    </IconButton>
  </Box>
)}
```

## **🎯 Issue Analysis:**

2. **Layout flex issues** preventing text from showing
3. **Typography styling** might be hiding the content

## **🛠️ Let's fix the PaymentHeader component:**

```typescript:src/features/purchaseModal/components/payments/PaymentHeader.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, IconButton } from '@mui/material';
import ArrowBackIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ArrowBack';
import CloseIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Close';

interface PaymentHeaderProps {
  contentTitle: string;
  contentPrice: number;
  onBack: () => void;
  onClose: () => void;
}

export default function PaymentHeader({ 
  contentTitle, 
  contentPrice, 
  onBack, 
  onClose 
}: PaymentHeaderProps) {
  // Debug logging
  console.log('🎯 PaymentHeader received props:', {
    contentTitle,
    contentPrice,
    hasTitle: !!contentTitle,
    hasPrice: !!contentPrice,
  });

  return (
    <Box
      sx={{
        display: 'flex',
        justifyContent: 'space-between',
        alignItems: 'center',
        p: 3,
        borderBottom: '1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)',
        backdropFilter: 'blur(24px)',
        WebkitBackdropFilter: 'blur(24px)',
        background: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)',
        minHeight: 85,
        width: '100%', // Ensure full width
      }}
    >
      {/* Left Side - Logo + Back + Payment Info */}
      <Box sx={{ 
        display: 'flex', 
        alignItems: 'center', 
        gap: 2, 
        flex: 1,
        minWidth: 0, // Allow shrinking
      }}>
        {/* Logo */}
        <Box sx={{ 
          display: 'flex', 
          alignItems: 'center', 
          gap: 1.5,
          flexShrink: 0, // Don't shrink logo
        }}>
          <Box sx={{ 
            width: 36,
            height: 36, 
            borderRadius: 2,
            overflow: 'hidden',
          }}>
            <img 
              src="/images/gmas-app-square.png" 
              alt="Grab Me a Slice Logo" 
              style={{ 
                width: '100%', 
                height: '100%', 
                objectFit: 'cover' 
              }} 
            />
          </Box>

          <Box sx={{ 
            height: 26,
            display: 'flex',
            alignItems: 'center'
          }}>
            <img 
              src="/images/gmas-written.png" 
              alt="Grab Me a Slice"
              style={{ 
                height: '100%',
                width: 'auto',
                objectFit: 'contain',
              }} 
            />
          </Box>
        </Box>

        {/* Separator */}
        <Box
          sx={{
            width: 1,
            height: 24,
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)',
            mx: 1,
            flexShrink: 0,
          }}
        />

        {/* Back Button */}
        <IconButton
          onClick={onBack}
          sx={{
            color: 'white',
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15)',
            border: '1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)',
            borderRadius: '10px',
            width: 36,
            height: 36,
            flexShrink: 0,
            '&:hover': {
              backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)',
              transform: 'scale(1.05)',
            },
            transition: 'all 0.2s ease-in-out',
          }}
        >
          <ArrowBackIcon sx={{ fontSize: 18 }} />
        </IconButton>

        {/* Payment Details - Fixed styling */}
        <Box sx={{ 
          flex: 1, 
          minWidth: 0,
          ml: 2, // Add margin to separate from back button
        }}>
          <Typography
            variant="h6"
            sx={{
              color: '#ffffff !important', // Force white color
              fontWeight: 600,
              fontSize: '1.1rem',
              lineHeight: 1.2,
              mb: 0.5,
              // Remove ellipsis for debugging
              // overflow: 'hidden',
              // textOverflow: 'ellipsis',
              // whiteSpace: 'nowrap',
            }}
          >
            Complete Payment
          </Typography>
          <Typography
            variant="body2"
            sx={{
              color: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) !important', // Force white with opacity
              fontSize: '0.9rem',
              lineHeight: 1.2,
              // Remove ellipsis for debugging
              // overflow: 'hidden',
              // textOverflow: 'ellipsis',
              // whiteSpace: 'nowrap',
            }}
          >
            {contentTitle} • ${contentPrice.toFixed(2)}
          </Typography>
        </Box>
      </Box>
      
      {/* Close Button */}
      <IconButton
        onClick={onClose}
        sx={{
          color: 'white',
          backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15)',
          border: '1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)',
          borderRadius: '12px',
          width: 42,
          height: 42,
          flexShrink: 0,
          ml: 2, // Add margin to separate from content
          '&:hover': {
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)',
            transform: 'scale(1.05)',
          },
          transition: 'all 0.2s ease-in-out',
        }}
      >
        <CloseIcon sx={{ fontSize: 20 }} />
      </IconButton>
    </Box>
  );
}
```

## **🔑 Key Changes Made:**

1. **Forced white text color** with `!important` to override any theme conflicts
2. **Added proper flex properties** to prevent layout issues
3. **Removed text overflow** temporarily to see if ellipsis was hiding text
4. **Added margins** for better spacing between elements
5. **Fixed flex-shrink** properties to prevent unwanted shrinking
6. **Added width: 100%** to ensure header takes full width

## **🧪 If this doesn't work, try this simplified version:**

```typescript:src/features/purchaseModal/components/payments/PaymentHeader.tsx
export default function PaymentHeader({ 
  contentTitle, 
  contentPrice, 
  onBack, 
  onClose 
}: PaymentHeaderProps) {
  return (
    <Box sx={{ 
      p: 3, 
      background: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)',
      borderBottom: '1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)',
    }}>
      {/* Simple test layout */}
      <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center' }}>
        <Typography sx={{ color: 'white', fontSize: '18px' }}>
          Complete Payment: {contentTitle} - ${contentPrice}
        </Typography>
        <Box>
          <IconButton onClick={onBack} sx={{ color: 'white', mr: 1 }}>
            <ArrowBackIcon />
          </IconButton>
          <IconButton onClick={onClose} sx={{ color: 'white' }}>
            <CloseIcon />
          </IconButton>
        </Box>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
}
```

```typescript:src/features/purchaseModal/components/payments/PaymentHeader.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, IconButton } from '@mui/material';
import ArrowBackIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ArrowBack';
import CloseIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Close';

interface PaymentHeaderProps {
  contentTitle: string;
  contentPrice: number;
  onBack: () => void;
  onClose: () => void;
}

export default function PaymentHeader({ 
  contentTitle, 
  contentPrice, 
  onBack, 
  onClose 
}: PaymentHeaderProps) {
  return (
    <Box sx={{ 
      p: 3, 
      background: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)',
      borderBottom: '1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)',
      backdropFilter: 'blur(24px)',
      WebkitBackdropFilter: 'blur(24px)',
      minHeight: 85,
    }}>
      <Box sx={{ 
        display: 'flex', 
        justifyContent: 'space-between', 
        alignItems: 'center',
        width: '100%'
      }}>
        {/* Left Side - Logo + Payment Info */}
        <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 2 }}>
          {/* Logo */}
          <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 1.5 }}>
            <Box sx={{ 
              width: 36,
              height: 36, 
              borderRadius: 2,
              overflow: 'hidden',
            }}>
              <img 
                src="/images/gmas-app-square.png" 
                alt="Grab Me a Slice Logo" 
                style={{ 
                  width: '100%', 
                  height: '100%', 
                  objectFit: 'cover' 
                }} 
              />
            </Box>

            <Box sx={{ 
              height: 26,
              display: 'flex',
              alignItems: 'center'
            }}>
              <img 
                src="/images/gmas-written.png" 
                alt="Grab Me a Slice"
                style={{ 
                  height: '100%',
                  width: 'auto',
                  objectFit: 'contain',
                }} 
              />
            </Box>
          </Box>

          {/* Separator */}
          <Box
            sx={{
              width: 1,
              height: 24,
              backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)',
              mx: 1,
            }}
          />

          {/* Back Button */}
          <IconButton
            onClick={onBack}
            sx={{
              color: 'white',
              backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15)',
              border: '1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)',
              borderRadius: '10px',
              width: 36,
              height: 36,
              '&:hover': {
                backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)',
                transform: 'scale(1.05)',
              },
              transition: 'all 0.2s ease-in-out',
            }}
          >
            <ArrowBackIcon sx={{ fontSize: 18 }} />
          </IconButton>

          {/* Payment Text */}
          <Box>
            <Typography sx={{ 
              color: 'white', 
              fontSize: '1.1rem',
              fontWeight: 600,
              lineHeight: 1.2,
              mb: 0.5,
            }}>
              Complete Payment
            </Typography>
            <Typography sx={{ 
              color: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)', 
              fontSize: '0.85rem',
              lineHeight: 1.2,
            }}>
              {contentTitle} • ${contentPrice.toFixed(2)}
            </Typography>
          </Box>
        </Box>

        {/* Right Side - Close Button */}
        <IconButton
          onClick={onClose}
          sx={{
            color: 'white',
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15)',
            border: '1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)',
            borderRadius: '12px',
            width: 42,
            height: 42,
            '&:hover': {
              backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)',
              transform: 'scale(1.05)',
            },
            transition: 'all 0.2s ease-in-out',
          }}
        >
          <CloseIcon sx={{ fontSize: 20 }} />
        </IconButton>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
}
```

3. **Removed complex flex properties** that were causing issues

5. **Maintained proper spacing** with gap and margin properties

You're absolutely right! That rectangular box and the messy layout is terrible. Let me fix this properly with a clean, professional implementation:

```typescript:src/features/purchaseModal/components/payments/PaymentHeader.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, IconButton } from '@mui/material';
import ArrowBackIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ArrowBack';
import CloseIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Close';

interface PaymentHeaderProps {
  contentTitle: string;
  contentPrice: number;
  onBack: () => void;
  onClose: () => void;
}

export default function PaymentHeader({ 
  contentTitle, 
  contentPrice, 
  onBack, 
  onClose 
}: PaymentHeaderProps) {
  return (
    <Box
      sx={{
        display: 'flex',
        justifyContent: 'space-between',
        alignItems: 'center',
        px: 4,
        py: 3,
        borderBottom: '1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15)',
        // Remove all the weird background effects
        backgroundColor: 'transparent',
        minHeight: 80,
      }}
    >
      {/* Left Side - Logo + Back + Payment Info */}
      <Box sx={{ 
        display: 'flex', 
        alignItems: 'center', 
        gap: 3,
        flex: 1,
      }}>
        {/* Logo Group */}
        <Box sx={{ 
          display: 'flex', 
          alignItems: 'center', 
          gap: 1.5,
          flexShrink: 0,
        }}>
          <Box sx={{ 
            width: 32,
            height: 32, 
            borderRadius: 2,
            overflow: 'hidden',
          }}>
            <img 
              src="/images/gmas-app-square.png" 
              alt="Grab Me a Slice Logo" 
              style={{ 
                width: '100%', 
                height: '100%', 
                objectFit: 'cover' 
              }} 
            />
          </Box>
          <Box sx={{ 
            height: 24,
            display: 'flex',
            alignItems: 'center'
          }}>
            <img 
              src="/images/gmas-written.png" 
              alt="Grab Me a Slice"
              style={{ 
                height: '100%',
                width: 'auto',
                objectFit: 'contain',
              }} 
            />
          </Box>
        </Box>

        {/* Clean Separator */}
        <Box
          sx={{
            width: 1,
            height: 20,
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)',
            flexShrink: 0,
          }}
        />

        {/* Back Button */}
        <IconButton
          onClick={onBack}
          sx={{
            color: 'white',
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)',
            border: '1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)',
            borderRadius: '8px',
            width: 32,
            height: 32,
            flexShrink: 0,

              backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)',
              transform: 'scale(1.05)',
            },
            transition: 'all 0.2s ease',
          }}
        >
          <ArrowBackIcon sx={{ fontSize: 16 }} />
        </IconButton>

        {/* Payment Info - Clean Layout */}
        <Box sx={{ minWidth: 0 }}>
          <Typography
            sx={{
              color: 'white',

            Complete Payment
          </Typography>
          <Typography
            sx={{

          </Typography>
        </Box>
      </Box>
      
      {/* Close Button */}
      <IconButton
        onClick={onClose}
        sx={{
```
